issues.title: Frontmatter parse error
issues.suggestion: Fix or remove YAML frontmatter so the file can be parsed.

evidence.frontmatterError: yaml: line 1: did not find expected ',' or ']'

issues.title: Missing instructions for Aider
issues.message: Aider has configs but no repo-scope instructions were detected.
issues.suggestion: Add an instructions file for Aider or remove unused configs.

issues.title: Empty config or instruction file
issues.message: File is empty and may be ignored by tools.
issues.suggestion: Add meaningful content or remove the empty file.

issues.title: Config file is gitignored
issues.message: File is ignored by git and may not be shared with collaborators.
issues.suggestion: Remove it from .gitignore or relocate it to a tracked path.

issues.title: Tool requires a setting to activate instructions
issues.message: GitHub Copilot may require setting github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.useInstructionFiles to enable instruction files.
issues.suggestion: Enable github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.useInstructionFiles to ensure GitHub Copilot instructions are applied.
